column1: that's crunched through the covers. Woakes floats a loose half-volley outside off, Rahul moves forward, takes it on the up and drives it with great authority, through the covers. That blazed away to the boundary. How about that for a start?
Woakes pulls his length back outside off, no lateral movement, left alone
back of a length and angled into the hips, deflected square through the leg side with soft hands
good length and outside off, holds its line, 141ks, opens the face and taps the ball to cover
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, tap-and-run single to mid-off now
good length and outside off, Rahul presses forward and pushes the ball to cover
full and outside off, Dhawan cautiously shoulders arms
short and outside off, Dhawan jumps back and cuts it. The ball goes only as far as cover. Dhawan misses out on a scoring opportunity
Dhawan now hits through the line and takes four through cover. Pretty full and outside off, Dhawan reaches out for the ball with his hands and drives between cover and mid-off

and again. Dhawan hits the repeat button. This is a half-volley outside off, hint of swing, Dhawan inches forward and then flays it through extra cover. Looks like an easy-paced hit-through-the-line track
Willey drags his length back outside off, bounces and beats Dhawan's skittish push. No feet from Dhawan again
length and outside off, presses forward, pushes with a straight bat to the left of cover, mid-off moves to his right to hunt the ball down

edged and taken at second slip. Good, low catch by Stokes. Good length angled in on off, seams away slightly, Rahul is stapled to the crease and is squared up. Woakes earns the outside edge and Stokes dives low to his left to snaffle it. Plucked it inches from the ground
shot! Pitched up, overpitched and outside off, Kohli eases forward and unfurls a pristine drive, straight of mid-off
good length and outside off, skewed to mid-on off the inside half
nice and full outside off - not a half-volley - gets forward, shows off his straight bat and drives it straight of mid-off again. England need to tighten their lengths
length and outside off, opens the face, and glides it to point

Stokes nabs Kohli now. This is a huuuuuge scalp. Second slip dives low to his left and clings onto it with both hands. This is very, very full and wide outside off - a near yorker - Kohli reaches out and jabs his bat down on the ball. Takes the outside edge, Stokes is late to react but pouches it. No feet from Kohli. The Cuttack crowd has been hushed into silence
back of a length and outside off, punchily played to the covers
tucked off the hips through square leg
full on the stumps, played back down the pitch
back of a length and holds its line outside off, left alone
picked off the pads through midwicket
straying into the pads again, easily tucked to deep backward square leg for one

Woakes shells a return catch to his left. The bowler dived to his wrong side from his follow-through, and could not hang on. Good length on middle, Dhawan drives early and chips it back to the bowler. He gets away with it
short and wide outside off, Dhawan reaches out with his hands, flays and misses
change-up short ball on middle, aimed at the chest, Dhawan fends it to cover

follows two short balls with a very full ball - hangs it up outside off - Dhawan's feet stapled to the crease again. He reaches out with his hands. Throws his bat at a big cover drive and ends up dragging the ball back onto the stumps via a thick inside edge. The off stump is floored. The drop does not cost England. This is some start for Woakes and his team
good length and just a shade outside off, left alone
short and angled into the body of Dhoni. He jumps and fends to short leg
good length on middle and leg, worked defensively to midwicket
back of a length on of, jabbed into the cover-point region
back of a length on off stump, defends
short of a length on a tight line coming into the batsman from outside off, played off the back foot to point
cramped for room as he tries to tuck a short of a length ball off his hips and chips it in the air on the leg side, falls safe though
presses forward a little and nudges the ball in front of point
good length ball on off stump, Dhoni, from the crease, pushes the ball to mid-off rather awkwardly
shortish and outside off, Dhoni watches it carry on to the wicketkeeper.
good length and on a set of stumps outside off, ignored
good length and angled in, punched back to the bowler's left
full on off, driven straight to mid-off on the front foot
full and holds its line outside off, ignored. Back-to-back maidens
back of a length and on the hips, bail-high delivery, Yuvraj jumps, picks it up and flicks over square leg
good length ball, played back down the pitch
full incoming ball, squirts an inside edge onto the pad
short of a length and outside off, hip-high ball, Yuvraj picks up the length early. Rocks back and short-arm pulls it over midwicket. One-bounce four
straying into the pads of Yuvraj, half-volley, flicked with the wrists. Put away to the square-leg boundary
back of a length and on a fifth-stump line outside off, Dhoni holds his bat skyward and lets it pass
Dhoni shuffles off, meets a short ball, which is angled into him, fended to leg
pitched up and angled in on off, driveable length, but Dhoni's front foot does not meet the pitch. Squirted to the leg side off the inside half
short of a length and outside off, opens the face and drops the ball towards point
Dhoni gets his front foot moving. Stretches out, meets a full ball, and push-drives it to mid-on
back of a length and on a fifth or sixth-stump line outside off, Dhoni does not go after it
short of a length and outside off, Yuvraj leaves it
back of a length and outside off, Yuvraj opens the face and then runs the ball to backward point
full and angling away outside off, presses forward and pushes to cover
dug in short on the leg stump, hip-high delivery. Steps back and pulls it fine on the leg side
length and outside off, Yuvraj gets forward to meet the pitch. Driven to mid-off. Solid
pitched up and outside off, Yuvraj is right forward to meet the pitch. Stylishly drive, but straight to cover

low full-toss on off, chipped in the air over midwicket. Hales makes a sliding save at the edge of the boundary. Swats the ball back into the field of play and keeps it to two. First runs for Dhoni after playing out two maidens
full on the stumps, flicked through midwicket
Yuvraj's driving has been stylish today. Too full and outside off, Yuvraj stretches forward and creams it away, bisecting extra cover and mid-off
beats mid-off to his left now. In the third ball of the over, he beat mid-off to his right. Full on middle, Yuvraj holds his elbow up and punchily drives it down the ground
overpitched and outside off, unfurls another charming drive. This is hit straight to cover
short of a length on middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket
length ball on off, defended
pushed full and wide outside off, left alone
dug short and wide outside off, only 133ks, Dhoni skips back and swats a pull to deep midwicket
good length and wide outside off, Dhoni covers his off stump and shoulders arms
full and outside off, Dhoni lets this go too
back of a length and outside off, Yuvraj jabs the ball to point
short of a length and angling across off, Yuvraj stands tall and crisply punches the ball up to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, chopped to point
full on middle and leg, bunted to midwicket on the front foot
good length and angling away outside off, not much room, pushed to cover
back of a length on middle, tucks Yuvraj up for room slightly. Tapped to mid-on. Good comeback from Plunkett after a 12-run first over
short and wide outside off, Dhoni sizes it up and scythes a cut up and over point
good length and outside off, Dhoni shoulders arms
pitched up on off or just a shade outside off, shuffles across off stump and manipulates the ball into the vacant spaces at square leg with the wrists
good length and holds its line outside off, dabbed into the cover-point region
back of a length and angled in towards off, squirted to leg off an inside edge
digs it short and outside off, Dhoni shuffles across off again, ends up inside-edging it onto the pad
short of a length and outside off, Yuvraj drags a pull to midwicket where the fielder fumblesno
length and outside off, no slips, and Dhoni is aware of the field. He opens the face, and glides it with the wrists through the vacant cordon. Smart batting
full and straight, pushed to midwicket
full and angled in on off, Dhoni is on the move as he turns it to midwicket
full and outside off, loosens his wrists, opens the face, and dabs to point
short of a length and outside off, Yuvraj flashes it in the air.... Does not carry to backward point
back of a length and angled in just outside off, punched back down the pitch
short of a length and outside off, bursts off the pitch and sails over Yuvraj's attempted hook. If you want to go short, you have to aim at the throat or higher on this track
full and angling in, inside edged onto the pad as Yuvraj falls over the flick
edged fine to the left of the keeper. This is a genuine edge. Good length, angled in, and straightens away a bit. Yuvraj has a crease-bound poke and nicks it to where second slip may have been
full and angled into the pads, tucked around the corner
round the wicket, full outside off, he drives well away from his body and it squirts down to third man...brings up the fifty stand
on off stump, pushed towards mid-off
full, wide outside off, driven to deep cover
what a wonderful piece of timing, brings the bat down to a full delivery from round the wicket and punches it straight of mid-off
opens the face and finds backward point
tighter to off stump, fuller, he comes forward then glides to third man
round the wicket, on the stumps, flicked to short midwicket
another very nice piece of timing as he uses his feet then flicks wide of midwicket, long-on is able to get round
driven to long-on
touch short on off stump, he plays back and drives to cover
full toss, bunted down the ground to long-on
angled into the pads, flicked to deep square leg
on a length, defended towards point
fuller, outside off, he comes forward and drives to cover
drives again, gets a thick inside edge into his boot which bounces to cover
full and straight, pushed back down the pitch and Stokes fields
gets forward and pushes a length ball to deep cover
back of a length, straight, gets inside the line and tucks to deep square leg
full outside off, driven wide of the cover sweeper
shuffles across outside off and nudges to midwicket
pushed back to towards the bowler
straighter delivery, whips it off his pads and finds short fine leg
takes a stride down the pitch, makes the delivery very full, worked down the ground
round the wicket, bottom hand comes into play as he flicks from outside off down to long-on
short of a length, he plays a whip-pull off one leg which goes behind square but Plunkett does well at deep square
opens the face and guides to third man to take him to fifty off 56 balls...when India needed him
defended into midwicket
comes forward and drives to the covers
angled in at off stump, driven to mid-off
a bouncer, a little loopy, over off stump and he ducks
full, slips down the leg side, Yuvraj gets over the top with a sweep and gets it very fine...to the boundary in the blink of an eye
uses his feet then defends to cover
that's a good single, opens the face and taps it square to the off side
that's a thunderous straight drive, he came down the pitch and then drilled it just to the left of Moeen and straight of mid-off
this time he flicks to midwicket
not quite so full, nudged into the leg side
what a stroke! That's vintage Yuvraj...it's a full ball outside off and he just strides forward, then drives through the line to loft it effortlessly over long-off
opens the face this time and pushes to deep cover
back of a length, takes the pad to the leg side
round the wicket, short, angled down the leg side and he helps it round the corner with a pull wide of long leg
good comeback, a yorker at off stump, jabbed back to the bowler
another fumble in the in-field, drives a length ball to cover where Morgan lets it through his hands
round the wicket, full at middle, defended
goes back in the crease and works a slightly shorter ball through midwicket
touch short, Dhoni rocks back deep in the crease then plays with a straight(ish) bat to long-on
driven to short cover
angled into the pads, clipped behind square on the leg side
tapped square of the wicket and point can't cut off the single
and he's dispatched beautifully through midwicket, was too straight, Yuvraj flicks it strong wide of mid-on
drags the length back, is outside off, cut to deep cover and that's the century stand...only seems a few moments since the 50 stand was mentioned
down the leg side, first wide of the innings
good length, at the stumps, pushed back down the pitch
fuller, and the placement on this drive is perfect...it's just a push from Dhoni, puts it straight of mid-off and mid-on can't get across either
tucked off the pads to deep square
width outside off, square driven to deep cover...England haven't really got an answer to slow things at the moment
drives a full ball to the off side, Moeen gets across
defends off the stumps
almost a mix-up! Yuvraj flicks it off his pads, finds square leg and is sent back by Dhoni after wanting the single
pushed back to the bowler...good stuff from Moeen
a little shorter, pushed from outside off to long-on
uses his feet and works this just wide of midwicket...a quiet over
worked off the pads behind square, he wanted a second but decided against it
angled in at the left hander, better delivery, can only defended to the off side
super stroke, just a fraction short from Willey and Yuvraj is so quickly onto it with a short-arm jabby pull over midwicket
gives himself some room to the leg side and is then beaten as he aims through the off side...not sure that's quite needed at the moment
more controlled this time, doesn't move around his crease, angles the ball from outside off to third man
nudges a length ball behind square
pushes a length ball to the leg side
flicks squarer this time and it's placed well enough for a second
down the pitch, makes it into a low full toss and finds the bowler
dragged down short but he gets away with as Dhoni's pull comes off the bottom edge to short fine leg
fired down the leg side, might have seen Dhoni starting to come down
this time Dhoni did come down the pitch for sure...and plants Moeen over wide long-on with a clubbing swing of the bat
shorter, quicker, pushed to long-on
length ball outside off, pushed to the covers

dropped, although not sure Ball actually got a hand on it in the end...a huge leading edge as he aims over the leg side. The ball goes miles in the air, Ball runs back from mid-off and never looked certain under it. Tough catch, the ball was always going away from the fielder
pushed into the covers
flicked from off stump to midwicket
good line, tight on off stump, pushed back down the pitch
round the wicket, back of a length, pulled to midwicket
back of a length outside off, driven sweetly but finds cover
short and he goes leg side this time, whips the bat through a pull to deep midwicket
angled into the stumps from round the wicket, clipped to deep square
edged! Wide of the keeper. Not in control, flashing outside off at a full ball, but the nick flies wide enough to evade Buttler's glove and scoots to third man. Fifty for MSD
short of a length, angled into the pads and it's clipped away fine of long leg
back outside off, driven to deep cover
short, and too short
more excellent running as this is worked behind square
full, angled into the pads, deflects to the leg side
back of a length at off stump, tucked to midwicket
worked off the stumps into the leg side
full and straight, aiming to flick through midwicket and gets a inside edge into his boot
opens the face and dabs a length ball into the off side, smart batting
round the wicket, full at off stump, punched to mid-on
flashed away over backward point and wide of third man...Stokes kicks the ground in disgust. Was short and wide. A freebie
straightens the line, at off stump, pushed towards mid-on for a sharp single
a slower ball, full outside off, driven to deep point
what a stroke! Blimey, that's a gem and we've seen a few today...full at off stump from round the wicket and Yuvraj plays the perfect on-drive. Hold the pose.
slashes down to third man from outside off
over the wicket, back of a length at off stump, angled to point
skews this high in the as he tries to drive over the off stump, but it falls short of deep cover and the fielder is nearly beaten by the spin of the ball
ping! He races to 99 as he drives a full, wide delivery of mid-off. Skimming shot. Crowd is going wild
can't get the single there, the ball is on middle, tries to work to the leg side
and another dot! Flicks a fuller delivery from around middle and leg to midwicket

and there it is! Worked through square leg and his first hundred since 2011. What a story this is. Raises the arms in celebration then gets congratulated by that other old warrior, Dhoni. Now removes the helmet to soak it all in. Super innings
hip-high short ball outside off. Toe-ends a pull to wide mid-on
back of a length and outside off, chopped down to third man
short and down leg, past the pull. Wide
slower short ball outside off, 117ks, miscues a pull to deep midwicket
dug short and outside off from wide of the crease, more a forehand top-spin down the ground rather than a cricket shot
low full-toss outside off, whipped away to the left of midwicket
leg-side delivery, duly glanced to long leg
Dhoni races down the track, meets a very full ball sliding down the leg side. He just helps it fine on its way fine of long leg
Yuvraj steps away outside leg, the bowler follows him and shortens his length. Blocked back to the bowler
waist-high short ball on middle, swatted away to the left of deep square leg
full and veering down leg, brushes the pad on its way to the keeper
full and wide outside off, a crease-bound Yuvraj throws his bat at the ball. Slices an outside edge wide enough of the keeper, fine on the off side
short and outside off, swatted to midwicket
slower short ball outside off, 120ks, Dhoni waits for the ball to arrive, and swats it away again, this time to the right of midwicket
dug short on off, Dhoni is cramped for room. Flaps it away to square leg
short and outside off, not short enough, slower cutter. Yuvraj steps back, picks it up, and pulls flat and hard over midwicket
follows it with an off-stump yorker, dug out
bang, bang. Short and outside off, Yuvraj sinks his teeth into it and swats it over midwicket for another boundary
back of a length incutter, Dhoni swings early into a pull, and loses his shape. He gets an inside edge onto the thigh
short on middle, 128ks, Dhoni goes hard at the pull, loses his shape again, as the ball goes as far as midwicket. Dhoni's first runs off Woakes
very full and outside off, Yuvraj bends forward and crunches a drive to sweeper
full and rolls through outside off, sneaks under Dhoni's flash
Dhoni runs down the track, Woakes pulls his length back on off. It gets big on Dhoni, but he still smites a six over midwicket
Dhoni uses his feet again, this is very full and wide outside off. Dhoni reaches out with his hands and carves the ball through cover
full and outside off, opens the face and chips it to the left of extra cover
short and outside off, swats it off the inside half to square leg
full and holds its line on off, Yuvraj unfurls a lofted drive to long-on. Stylish....
short and outside off, pulled away square enough of short fine leg
hip-high short ball on off, you've got to get it up higher. Yuvraj picks up the slower cutter, and launches it over midwicket
full-toss outside off, slapped away to the long-off boundary
short and wide outside off, powerfully cuts to sweeper cover. Flat-batted away

Yuvraj is taking the short balls on. Chest-high short ball outside off, skips back and pulls it in the air. Splits wide long-on and deep midwicket. Away she goes all the way. This is the best pull of the day
low full-toss outside off, stabbed to mid-off
short and outside off, pulled past midwicket
full and very, very wide outside off. Dhoni reaches out but can't touch it
low full-toss outside off, 141ks, Dhoni uses the pace and steers the ball to swepeer
full and outside off, slices a fat edge over point. Simply swung his hands at the ball
very full on the leg stump, Yuvraj twirls his wrists and puts it away square of short fine leg. Poor ball, dispatched
very full and down the leg side, Stokes can't nail the yorker. Yuvraj lets this go
this is vintage Yuvraj. He is back with his career-best score in ODIs. Slower length ball outside off, Yuvraj lofts it with a straight bat over long-on. Flat hit for a six
full and outside off, Yuvraj cracks it up and over cover
very full on off, driven down the ground, straight of wide long-on
full and outside off from around the wicket, Yuvraj crouches and hacks it to cover, perhaps off the toe end
too wide outside off, Yuvraj can't touch it. Swings and loses his shape. He is floored in the process
short and outside off, Yuvraj can't get on top of it. Toe-ends a pull over midwicket
short and outside off, Dhoni pulls and gets it fine of long leg
full and wide outside off, Dhoni stays deep in the crease and flat-bats it fiercely past mid-off's left. The fielder dishes out a dive

wide yorker outside off, 139ks, Yuvraj jabs his bat down at the ball. Buttler pouches it. Umpire Anil Chaudhary raises his finger. Dhoni gesticulates for a review, Yuvraj goes for it. Yuvraj toe-ends it onto the ground, the ball bounces, before Buttler grasps it to his left. The replays confirm it. Umpire Chaudhary reverses his on-field call
scythed away to backward point
full and outside off, Yuvraj opens up his shoulders and lifts it over extra cover
full-toss outside off, flat-batted away to sweeper cover
yorker on off, dug out to the covers
yorker on off, powerfully dug back to the left of Stokes. The bowler copped a blow on the chest, but he's okay
overpitched and outside off, flowy drive to long-off. Yuvraj brings up his 150
full on off, whipped away to long leg
shortish and outside off, Dhoni winds up for a massive hit, ends up miscuing it to cover

whoa! full and outside off, Dhoni sizes it up and bludgeons it a long way over long-on. That's masssssive! 'That hit the top-most stand beyond the long-on boundary,' says our reporter Vishal from the ground. Not too dissimilar from that six off Kulasekara in the 2011 World Cup final at Mumbai. Such clean striking from Dhoni. He moves to 99
very short and outside off, bounces up and over Dhoni's hook
slapped away to extra cover

dug in short and outside off, Dhoni is not in control of the hook. Skies it in the air but to the right of Hales at deep square leg. Tenth ODI hundred for Dhoni, and his first since stepping down as captain
full and outside off, Yuvraj looks to drive it down the ground. He can only nick it behind to the keeper. It was in the slot, but Yuvraj's execution was off for a change. End of a crackling innings
low full-toss outside off, pushed to cover
pulled away to short fine leg
full on the stumps, whipped through square leg. Front-foot no-ball from Plunkett

good length on off, Dhoni has a wild, wild club to the leg side. Does not make contact as he loses his shape. The ball hits the top of off stump and floats away to the right of the keeper to the boundary. Bizarre play, in the end it's four byes
leg-side wide
back of a length on middle, played back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, Jadhav simply guides it fine of third man and gets a four
very full on off, shovelled to midwicket. The fielder has a aim at the non-striker's end and misses. Concedes an overthrow
full-toss on off, hit down to long-on
full on off, Dhoni belts it straight down the ground with immense power. What a clubbing swing. Forces both the umpire and Jadhav to take evasive action
short and outside off, short-armed away to wide long-on
terrific execution from Jadhav. Slower one, short of a length on off, Jadhav is on the front foot. Shovel-pulling it over midwicket. Phew, how did he do that?
very full on the toes, not quite a yorker, clipped down to long leg
good length ball on off, shuffles across a bit and nudges the ball into the vacant spaces at midwicket
full ball on off, possibly a slower one, Dhoni calls for two as he clips to deep midwicket. Jadhav hares across
short and banged down the leg side, Dhoni swipes hard, so much so he nearly swings himself off his feet. Can't touch it
good length on off, jabbed towards the covers for one
launches it in front of the sightscreen. Full on off - cross-seamer - Jadhav lofts it with a straight bat over long-off. Skims away over the boundary. Just beautiful.
short and just outside off, arches his back and ramps it fine of third man. Plunkett is ready to tear his hair apart
and he holes out to midwicket running in off a full-toss. On off, Jadhav drags it off the toe end to Ball
full-toss outside off, carved away to sweeper
and he sets to work immediately. Ball aims for a yorker, comes out as a full-toss, driven between extra cover and mid-off
short and outside off, Pandya jumps back and pulls it over deep square leg, clears a leaping Stokes. A ball-boy chucks the ball into the face of Stokes. It was accidental
full and wide outside off, slices and misses
low full-toss on off, hacked away to mid-on
low full-toss on off, belted down to long-on
Dhoni gallops down the track, meets a full-toss on leg, and clobbers it into the stands beyond midwicket
very full on off, England can't nail their yorkers, flat-bats a drive back to the bowler
full-toss on off, attempted yorker gone wrong, muscled away to deep midwicket
dug short and outside off, this is Dhoni of the old. Hitting boundaries at will in the death overs. Smokes a pull into the stands beyond midwicket again
those Dhoni blows put the bowler off track. Slings it full and down leg, nothing doing from Dhoni. He has already done some damage with those boundaries
more damage! Dhoni skips away outside leg. Plunkett follows the batsman with a full-toss, which is smeared over extra cover. Opens the face and drives it away

full-toss on the leg stump, Dhoni picks it up and swipes it into the hands of Willey at deep square leg. Dhoni wrings his hands in pain, did not get the desired power behind that hit. Nevertheless, Dhoni walks back to a rousing reception
full toss outside off, pushed through the covers
mid-off is inside the circle and Pandya goes over him. Clears his front leg and puts the full-toss over mid-off
length and outside off, muscled away to long-on
full and outside off, opens the face and carves it over cover-point

that's blasted back to Ball. It has been drilled into the wrist of Ball, who was taking evasive action. The umpire was also taking evasive action. Ball gets pinged on the left wrist and needs some medical attention.
wide yorker, squirted to cover
low full-toss outside off, sliced away square on the off side. Jadeja hurtles back for the second
low full-toss outside off, slapped away to third man
Pandya pre-meditates by walking across off, scoops this length ball in the air to the left of the keeper
too full on middle and off, Jadeja goes over his favourite midwicket region. Picks it up, splitting the two men in the deep. India reach 375
overpitched and outside off - England have struggled with their lengths in the death - Jadeja hangs back, crouches a bit and pastes a flat six over long-off
head-hunting short ball, zings through to the keeper, beating Jadeja's hook
left alone outside off
hint of swing back from a fairly wide line, Roy watches it go through
cuts to cover off the front foot
full at off stump, 140kph, Roy defends to mid-off coming forward...hint of nibble
finishes the over with an inswinger, takes Roy high on the pad...a maiden to start
off the mark straight away, length outside off and it's driven on the up square through the off side
back of a length, defended at the top of the bounce towards mid-off
and, like in India's innings, the free hit costs four, leg byes this time, as a well-directed yorked glances off Hales' boot fine past Dhoni
drives a fraction early outside off and takes his bottom hand off the bat
lovely delivery! Cut in half again as there's significant movement off the seam
played to the off side
length ball wide outside off, there are six men in the circle on the off side, Hales reaches out and helps that over the infield to the third-man boundary for four
a good-looking stroke for no run, a crisp drive towards mid-off from Hales
now there is a third man in place, and he has work to do immediately, the ball is guided down by Hales, Bumrah has to race to his left, almost fumbles it but manages to keep it within the rope
boundary to finish the over, crunches this back of length ball through extra cover for four
Bumrah starts the over with a wide down the leg side, a full ball from Bumrah

huge appeal for lbw, that was a full toss on the pads, hit above the knee roll, looked like it was heading down the leg side, the dribbles towards the leg side for two leg byes, Bumrah was confident as he appealed, the umpire is unmoved
inside edge past the stumps for four! looking to drive that through the off side on the up, nicks it and is fortunate that doesn't hit the stumps, gets four as a bonus
back of length ball heading for leg, helped down towards fine leg for a single
an early breakthrough for India! Bumrah removes Hales, short of a length ball that cuts away just a touch, Hales is drawn towards it and he feathers it through for a simple catch to Dhoni
what a shot first ball, a stylish cut behind point for four, just a bit of width and that's enough for the batsman, even on his first delivery
back of a length at off stump, defended towards slip
gets a good stride forward and drives on the up to cover
uses his feet, walks across the crease and down the pitch then works a length ball to the leg side
played off the back foot towards mid-off
stays back, defends with a open face, the delivery was reasonably full
a sharp single as he drives into the cover ring, ran on the shot, the throw was wide...think Roy would have been okay
back of a length outside off, punched to the cover ring
rocks back and latches onto a hint of a width, square driving through point
fuller, outside off, Root hanging back and it runs off the face to third man
opens the face and finds short third man who is inside the circle
threads the gap this time, waits for the delivery outside off, opens the face and steers it between short third man and backward point
straighter, pushed wide of mid-on
nips back from outside off, Roy jabs down and the ball runs into the point area
pushed with an open face and finds point
good delivery, back of a length outside off, holds its line off the seam and beats Root's outside edge
walks at the bowler, drives to cover
gets cramped for room as this nips back, Root shaping to cut and ends up taking his bottom hand off the bat but he's still able to run it to third man
touch fuller outside off, pushed into the covers...an excellent over
slash and a miss outside off, he saw some width and went after it with a cut shot

through the gap, and there isn't much of a gap! This time he connects with the cut, or a square drive actually off the front foot, and it flies in the air between the two men in the backward point area
fuller outside off, driven into the leg side
full and straight, flicked to mid-on
back of a length outside off, Root on his toes and plays to the covers
drives square off the front foot, picks out point this time but it's not fielding cleanly
walks across his crease and takes a ball from outside off towards mid-on
this is a touch wider and he tries to drive through the off side but gets beaten on the inside edge...may have kept a fraction low
beaten again, top edge this as he tries to cut...this is very good bowling from Buvi
gets this straight of mid-off, drives on the up, was quite a short delivery, but got his placement spot on
cuts square into the off side
gets a little too short and straight, allows Root to roll his wrists on a pull and he places it wide of short fine leg
can't get it any straighter than that...and it costs Roy. He pings a straight drive off the front foot into the non-striker's stumps
now some extra bounce outside off, beats Root's top as he tries to play square through the off side...ball skidding on a little more
can't quite beat mid-off this time as he drives, Pandya gets a good dive in and palms the ball towards mid-off
full outside off, another well-timed punchy straight drive by Bumrah is able to get his right hand to it
deft touch this time, a little bit of width outside off and Roy waits for it them opens the face and guides the ball fine of third man
similar shot, but it goes squarer to third man this time
round the wicket, full, driven to long-off
straighter delivery, pushed into the off side
uses his feet then clips down to long-on
nicely bowled, angled in at middle and leg and just grips enough to take a leading edge as Roy aims to the leg side
cut to deep point
worked off the pads to deep square leg
beats him first ball...full outside off, a little bit of nibble, Root coming forward
charges down the pitch, Pandya had time to adjust his length and bang it in shorter, at a slippery 143kph, and Root gets beaten as he tries to pull
short outside off, sweetly connected by Root but the cut finds point
flicked off the pads to deep square
another short ball, well directed over middle and leg, Roy was starting to advance then bailed out
goes after the short ball this time, finds the middle and pulls it in the air well in front of square...spoils what would have been a terrific over. Still good.
worked off the back foot through midwicket
gets a bottom edge on a sweep, runs quickly to the fine leg boundary...wrong line
punched into the leg side, finds midwicket
short outside off, slapped back to the bowler who can't gather it
skids on towards leg stump, pushed straight of midwicket
fuller, played back to the bowler
a bottom-handed which from off stump towards mid-on who the hits direct at the non-striker's end
that's big! He comes down the pitch and picks up a back-of-a-length delivery over deep midwicket
opens the face down to third man
outside edge as, I think, he was trying to work to the leg side against a delivery quite wide outside off...runs to third man
short, pulled to midwicket on the edge of the ring
a length delivery at off stump, Roy gives himself a touch of room by staying around leg stump and drives on the up to cover
fetches this from outside off with a sweep which dribbles to the leg side
uses his feet, the ball isn't there to drive so he pushes to midwicket
short, sits up, pulled to long-on
plays back and tucks through midwicket, Root looking for two immediately and Roy responds
sweeps to deep square leg
plays forward with bat and pad together, pushes to cover
drives to cover off the front foot
that's a fantastic shot by Root, he upper cuts, or almost ramps, a short ball outside off fine of third man
down the pitch and clubs a back-of-a-length delivery towards mid-off
offered some width outside off and Roy throws his hands through a square drive, goes in the air but well clear of any fielders...England's 100 up
driven to long on
on off stump, opens the face to third man
played off the back foot into the leg side, midwicket dives to cut it off
manages to flick this to the right of midwicket this time
straight, pushed to the bowler
cuts off the stumps into the covers
a fraction shorter, he drives it to long-off
into the pads, flicked through midwicket...tight over from Jadeja
that's a brilliant stroke, he opens the face and drives behind square on the off side...touch and placement outstanding. Too much width
worked down the ground
dropped, was a finger-tip chance to midwicket! Short of a length, Roy pulls and connects pretty well. Bumrah doesn't quite time his jump correctly and can't grasp on
back of a length, the bottom hand takes over as he plays with a straight bat towards mid-on
fuller, outside off, drives to deep cover
full outside off, he drives and finds cover
full on off from around the wicket, straight-bat push to mid-off
very full and drifts in on off and middle, Root plays across the line and edges it onto the pad
chipped back to the left of the bowler
very full and darted in on middle, no room at all, pushed back to Jadeja
92ks, fizzes in to beat the batsman for pace and strike the front pad. Skidding down the leg side
Jadeja gives this some air, but full on middle, Root flows forward and drives back to him
full and sliding across the off stump, dabbed through cover-point. Roy brings up his fifty
Ashwin straightens his line, Root unfurls the reverse-sweep now. Hits it square enough of short third man. Root now brings up his fifty
skids on outside off, chopped down to third man
full outside off, push-driven to mid-off. 100 partnership up

Ashwin breaks the century stand in his first over. Tossed-up offbreak, does not turn much but dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch. Root goes low for a slog-sweep, probably bounced higher. He does not get hold of it. Only skies it in the air off a top edge. Kohli runs in and settles under it at midwicket
this slides on outside off, stretches forward and toe-ends a drive to mid-off
full and outside off, worked down to long-on
short on off, solidly punched to long-off
full on off, clipped through the vacant spaces at midwicket
short and wide outside off, turns away, slashed in the air over backward point
beats long-on to his left. Short on off, fractionally short, the batsman jumps back and thumps a pull down the ground
fired flatter and quicker on off, jabbed down to long-on
flighted offbreak outside off, forward and pushed to cover
slider, 92ks, back-foot punch to long-on
left alone outside off
back of a length and outside off, punched to cover
slower offbreak outside off, gets forward and plays up to cover
hurled short and just outside off, Morgan throws his hands at a cut  and chops an inside edge
length and turns away outside off, guided to deep point
back of a length and spins back in, keeps Morgan honest. Played back
'good bowling Jaddu' is the cry from Dhoni. Full on middle, driven down the ground
short and outside off, goes back and chops square on off
full on off. Morgan is forward to drive it to the left of Jadeja
dropped short and outside off, flat-batted away to Dhawan at wide long-off
full and outside off, driven through the covers on the front foot
shortish and on the pads, clipped down to long leg
whipped around the corner
shorter and outside off, chopped to extra cover
darted short and down leg - slider - leg-side wide
Roy sends it skimming over mid-off who is inside the circle. Tossed up on off, Roy seems the flight and lofts it regally down the ground
flighted offbreak, turns, takes the inside edge and rolls down to long leg
short and angled in, goes back and punches a single to long-on
tapped down to long-on
drifts in full on middle, crisply driven to long-off
pushed back to the bowler, Jadeja dives to his right to stop the ball
flatter and spins back in on off, punchily played back to Jadeja
shorter on off, whipped down to long-on for one more
yorker on off from around the wicket, jammed out to mid-off
drags this full ball from the stumps to deep square leg with a slog-sweep
full on middle, driven down the ground
chipped to midwicket
dropped short and sliding just outside off, goes back and slashes a cut in the air, clears a leaping Jadeja at cover
pushed through on the stumps, 92ks, driven down to long-on

Jadeja leaves Roy's stumps in a mess. Slides in with the arm, and straightens. Roy aims to chop or dab it from the stumps towards third man. He can't lay bat on ball, and Jadeja strikes. Spinners setting England back
skids in on middle from over the wicket, punchily played back
chopped away square on the off side
quicker and spins in, goes back and punches to mid-on
fuller and on off, pushed to mid-on again
veering into the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
floated up just outside off, Morgan presses forward and drives to long-off

Inside-edged onto the middle stump. This was the arm-ball from Ashwin slides in and keeps a touch low. Instead of meeting the ball on the front foot, Stokes plays back and drags it onto the stumps. Two wickets in eight balls
uses his feet and drives to long-on

hit outside the line of off, and the lbw appeal is struck down. Buttler shuffles across off and can't connect with a paddle. The ball rolls square on the leg side as the batsmen attempt to pinch a legbye, but Dhoni runs across, slips, and that's kept to a dot
Buttler dashes down the track and mows a tossed-up ball to the midwicket boundary
tossed up, angled in, and turns away outside off past the skittish waft of Buttler
shorter, it is, and quicker on the pads, nudged square on leg
short and spins in, punched down to long-on
driven down the ground to long-off for one. Jadeja's uninterrupted spell ends: 10-0-45-1
fuller and on the pads, whipped to wide long-on
straighter and slower on middle, played back to the bowler
seems the batsman give the charge, drops his short. Morgan does not meet the pitch as he forces to cover
Ashwin slows it up, gives it more flight. Morgan stretches forward and launches it straight down the ground
worked to leg
tossed-up offbreak, nudged with soft hands into the vacant areas at midwicket. Buttler calls for two and gets it
full and angling away outside off from over the wicket, Morgan attempts an ambitious drive and skews an outside edge fine of Ashwin at third man. He dishes out a sliding save
back of a length and angling away outside off, this is chopped away square of Ashwin at third man
back of a length and outside off, bounces up over the attempted cut
fractionally short and wide outside off, thrashes a cut to backward point. There is another man at square-ish point
Morgan charges down the track, takes a half-volley, and hoists it, clearing the long-off boundary
Pandya goes full on off, Morgan push-drives it to long-on on the front foot
short and darted into the pads, skips back and punches to wide long-on. Jadeja slides, and he keeps it to one

Buttler shows his ace early and advances down the track. Ashwin is wary of it as he fires it short and quick - 93.2ks- down the leg side; leg-side wide it is. Buttler, having ventured a long way down the track, is beaten lavishly. Dhoni, the cool cat, collects it and flips the bails off although the ball got caught in the webbing
tossed-up outside off, offbreak, square-driven away
tossed up full and outside off, Morgan stretches forward and slams it powerfully over wide long-on for a six
flatter and slides in, taps it to midwicket for one
pitched up and holds its line outside off, driven to long-off
wide half-volley outside off, Moeen reaches out with his hands and lashes a drive through cover. He held nothing back
much slower on off, dabbed towards cover-point
too full and outside off, no spin, driven down to long-off
very short and skids in from wide of the crease. Pushed back
full-toss outside off, not sure it slipped out of the hand, driven away to sweeper
full and slides on off, pushed to cover

shorter on off, goes back and clips it through backward square leg. Moeen runs back for the second. Dhoni misses a run-out chance. The ball pops out of the glove as he aims to collect the ball. The ball bounced very close to him and he fumbles
shorter and fired on off, punched to deepish mid-on
short of a length on off, punched to mid-off
driven straight of mid-off for one
speared into the pads, forced to long-on
looped up full and outside off, Morgan gets forward and flays a drive to sweeper cover
steps back and cuts a short ball from outside off to sweeper cover
skids on, full-toss on off, did that slip out because of dew? Punched to long-off
slammed from off stump to the left of long-on. Slog-swept away to the fence
full and angled in, hit down to long-on again
shorter and outside off, slashed in the air, does not carry to backward point
opens the face and drives it to backward point again
full and holds its line outside off, pushed down to long-off
skids on wide outside off, lashed away to the left of mid-off
drops it short and outside off - keeps low - messes with Morgan's cut. Chopped to cover
full and outside off, played up to cover. Excellent over - just one off it
short, down the leg side, a poor ball which is pulled behind square
short outside off this time, but just a single as he cuts to deep cover
pushed into the covers
ticked into the leg side
pushed back to the bowler
plays forward, gets a thick inside edge to the leg side
back of a length at off stump, pushed to the covers
short of a length, Moeen gets nicely underneath and pulls over midwicket
round the wicket, Moeen opens the face and dabs to backward point
on leg stump, flicked off the pads to deep square and takes Morgan to his fifty
at off stump, pushed square into the off side
pushes a length ball to the covers
that's into the stands! A length ball at off stump and Morgan swings it high over long-on
and now he goes through midwicket! Morgan on the charge, fetches a length ball from outside off and whistles a pull through the leg side
fired across wide outside off, he just manages to reach it and cut to deep point
full outside off, a rather ungainly heave into the leg side off the toe end
comes forward into a full, straight delivery and pushes to long-off
pushes a length ball square into the off side...14 off the over
round the wicket, full outside off, pushed carefully to deep cover
short outside off, cut through the off side
touch wider, he chases it and the ball takes the toe end towards short third man
full at off stump, defended
presses forward, can't beat the off-side ring
he's happy to see out Ashwin, defends his last ball back to the bowler
fired in at leg stump, takes the pad
down the pitch to a big toss, drives over cover but straight to the sweeper
flicked off the pads behind square on the leg side
clears his front foot and drives through the line to deep cover
flicked from outside off along the ground to long-on
a low full toss outside off but Moeen can only cloth it through the leg side
short of a length, he goes for the pull and doesn't make contact, gets taken high on the pad and Buvi follows through quickly to prevent a leg bye
dropped, the pressure should have told! Moeen gets underneath a heave down the ground, the ball goes high and Jadeja, of all people, at long-on lets it through his hands. Damp ball?
not much coming out of the middle, he heaves again to the leg side and the lack of timing actually helps him get back for a second
full and wide outside off, gets a bottom edge which runs towards Dhoni behind the stumps
lofts in the air over cover, wide of the sweeper
that was a good delivery, a wide yorker, but it almost cost four as Moeen played a superbly timed square drive with an open face...need a good diving save around the rope
can't get a low full toss away, drives back to the bowler
a flat pull races through midwicket, wasn't that short
fired it at leg stump, another full toss, pushed to long-on
flings this very wide as he saw Moeen starting to use his feet
full and straight, Moeen stays in his crease and heaves it just wide of long-on...not sure Jadeja picked that up
down on his back knee this time and slog sweeps, through square leg, and that's his fifty off 40 balls
gets underneath this, a full delivery, and lofts it one bounce to long-on...that's one of the overs England needed
a yorker, outside off, comes off the toe end down to long-off
a full wide yorker again, takes the toe end as Morgan swings and it scuttles quickly to short third man...yard either side and that was four

dragged on! That's what India needed. A wicket for the stoppage? A length ball outside off, Moeen tries to swing it away and gets a bottom edge into off stump. Was a slower ball, too, so credit to Buvi. Moeen through the shot
back of a length at off stump, defended to the covers
this pops off a leading edge down towards long-on, another slower ball
full and wide, drives to cover...just three runs and a wicket off the over
backs away to leg and drills this powerfully through the off side, superb timing, it skimmed past cover inside the circle
off stump goes back! Another subtle change of pace. It's a length ball at off stump, Woakes tries to heave to the leg side and is far too early on the stroke. Excellent delivery
that looked good for lbw, full and straight, Plunkett misses but has walked down the pitch
full outside off, driven and edged wide of Dhoni to third man
tucks a straight delivery behind square
full, pushed across outside off, another slower delivery which defeats Morgan
uses his feet then doesn't make contact as he thrashes at a delivery outside off
a full, wide yorker, Plunkett leaves it alone hoping for a wide but it's well inside the marker

back of a length, he heaves to the leg side, misses, but they scamper a bye through to Dhoni who misses his underarm flick. Morgan knows it's getting desperate. Well, given a run. Must have been an under edge
gets a boundary, a crunching blow over the off side as Buvi just misses his wide yorker this time
uses his feet, it's full and straight, flicked towards short fine leg where Bumrah makes an important one-handed save
and now Plunkett finds deep midwicket, slugged from full outside off and it splits the gap perfectly
down the pitch outside leg stump, flicked along the ground through midwicket and does well to get back for the second
over the rope! Length outside off, Morgan stands still and clubs it clear of the long-on boundary...this isn't over, folks
low full toss, driven to long-off

he's been given lbw and Plunkett has called for the review. Did he get outside the line of off stump? He's well across the crease. Yes, impact outside the line. But, hang on, there's confusion here! Third umpire says to stay with the on-field decision...for a moment the decision is upheld, but then finally overturned
crunched! That's a fierce blow down the ground. Stand and deliver from Plunkett as he drills through the line
back to back boundaries! Oh boy. This is dropped shorter, Plunkett gets underneath and pulls it down to the vacant fine leg area
uses his feet, clips it off his pads behind square on the leg side...dives to make his crease as Dhoni tries one of his back-handed flicks of the return into the stumps. He hits but Morgan safe
beats the fielder this time! Poor line, outside leg stump, it's almost a free swing for Morgan and he places it wide of deep square leg
over the off side this time, what a finish we have here! Buvi pushed the ball full and across Morgan who sliced it over backward point and it skipped away
round the wicket, full and wide outside off, driven to long-off
very wide outside off, would have been a wide if Plunkett hadn't walked across and caught up with it...gets a toe end to third man
he can only get this full delivery - which Morgan made fuller by coming down the pitch - to long-on but it means he has the strike
full toss, just clears backward point! The early boundary for the over, slices over the infield as he swings hard, and that's a fantastic century! Brief acknowledgement. Job to do
another full toss, a bigger one this time, comes off more top edge than middle and falls into space on the off side. Loses the strike

super bit of cricket which could seal the deal! Get his yorker in, Plunkett can only find the bowler. Morgan had already sprinted off to try and get the strike back. Bumrah calmly turned, moved towards the stumps and then threw the ball when he was closer
well bowled again, full at the stumps, driven down the ground
wide yorker, Willey jabs it square towards point
somehow gets a boundary, he was going for the scoop over fine leg and in the end it came off the top edge and cleared short third man
round the wicket, full outside off, driven to deep cover
full and wide, skews off the outer part of the bat towards Yuvraj at backward point...actually reached him on the full, but more importantly he stopped the boundary
slams a full delivery straight to cover on the edge of the ring...they get back for the second on the misfield
gets under the bat with a wide yorker, Dhoni gathers and it's just one to the total...now the crowd start to cheer even louder
swings to the leg side, beaten by a slower ball...Kohli starts to celebrate
full, straight, driven down the ground
